  • 字段详细资料

    • discardPile

      public ArrayList<RumourCard> discardPile
      Discard pile.

    • nRumourCards

      public static final int nRumourCards
      Default Rumour card number 12
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Game

      public Game()
      Initializes the game.
      • Sets nPlayer
      • Sets player's identity
      • Initializes the card pile

  • 方法详细资料

    • shuffleCard

      public void shuffleCard()
      Shuffles card pile using Collections.shuffle().

    • initPile

      public void initPile()
      Initializes card pile.

      Initializes cardPile and discardPlie.

      Instantiates all Rumour cards, then add them to cardPile.

      Calls shuffleCard() to shuffle cardPile.

    • initPlayer

      public void initPlayer()
      Initializes human player and bot players at the begin of game.

      Instantiates all the players, sets their identities, then add them to playerList.

      Randomly chooses the start player.

    • distribute

      public void distribute()
      Distributes Rumour cards to the players in playerList.

      Additionally, in a 5-player game treat the 2 cards placed beside the play area at the start of the game as discarded cards.

    • chooseIdentity

      public void chooseIdentity()
      Sets bot player's identity

    • getnPlayer

      public int getnPlayer()
      Gets nPlayer.
      返回:
      nPlayer

    • setnPlayer

      public void setnPlayer(int nPlayer)
      Sets nPlayer.
      参数:
      nPlayer - player number

    • getPlayerList

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayerList()
      Gets playerList.
      返回:
      playerList

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets reference of currentPlayer.
      返回:
      currentPlayer

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player player)
      Sets currentPlayer
      参数:
      player - reference of a player

    • getAccuse

      public int[] getAccuse()
      Gets the accuse relation.
      返回:
      array with playerId of two players

    • getDiscardPile

      public ArrayList<RumourCard> getDiscardPile()
      Gets discard pile.
      返回:
      discardPile

    • getGamePane

      public GamePane getGamePane()
      Gets game panel.
      返回:
      gamePane

    • setGamePane

      public void setGamePane(GamePane gamePane)
      Sets game panel.
      参数:
      gamePane - reference of GamePane

    • playBot

      public void playBot()
      Play game with a human player and several bot players.

      Players take turns for rounds, choosing to accuse another player or use Witch! effect of a Rumour card. This method also updates GamePane and Player.

      If a round is end, then start a new round by resetting the states of game, players and cards.

      If one player has enough points to win, then the game ends.

    • outOfGame

      public void outOfGame()
      Judges if a player is out of game.

      If a player is revealed as Witch, then he is out of game.

    • isRoundEnd

      public boolean isRoundEnd()
      Judges if this round is end.

      If there is only one player with a unrevealed identity card, then the round ends.

      If this player is a Witch, then he gets 2 points, if this player is a Villager, then he gets 1 point.

      返回:
      true if this round ends, false otherwise.

    • isGameEnd

      public boolean isGameEnd()
      Judges if this game is end.

      If there is a player who reaches 5 points, then this game ends.

      If the game is tied, then layers will have a high-stakes “monkey knife fight” and duel to the death. The survivor wins.

      返回:
      true if the game is end, false otherwise

    • scoreBoard

      public void scoreBoard()
      Prints every player's points in command line.

    • displayPlayers

      public void displayPlayers()
      Prints player list in command line except current player.

      This method is used in DuckingStool.huntEffect(Game)

    • displayUnaccusedPlayers

      public void displayUnaccusedPlayers()
      Prints the players who haven't been accused to reveal identity card in command line.

    • findPlayer

      public Player findPlayer(int id)
      Finds a player in playerList by his id.
      参数:
      id - target player's id
      返回:
      reference of this player, null if not found.

    • displayStatus

      public void displayStatus()
      Prints every player's state in command line.

      State:

      • number of hand cards
      • number of revealed Rumour cards
      • state of identity
      • points

    • setIdentity

      public void setIdentity()
      User chooses his identity via dialog.

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers()
      User sets nPlayer via dialog

    • hangOn

      public void hangOn()
      Causes application to sleep 1 second in order to wait UI to refresh.
